parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID for the jobs.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The queue ID for the job.

nested_items.name: jobs
nested_items.description: The jobs on the list.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The job ID.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The job name.

nested_items.name: lifecycleStatus
nested_items.description: The life cycle status.

nested_items.name: lifecycleStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The life cycle status message.

nested_items.name: priority
nested_items.description: The job priority.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that created this resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that updated this resource.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource started running.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource ended running.

nested_items.name: taskRunStatus
nested_items.description: The task run status for the job.
PENDING---pending and waiting for resources.
READY---ready to be processed.
ASSIGNED---assigned and will run next on a worker.
SCHEDULED---scheduled to be run on a worker.
INTERRUPTING---being interrupted.
RUNNING---running on a worker.
SUSPENDED---the task is suspended.
CANCELED---the task has been canceled.
FAILED---the task has failed.
SUCCEEDED---the task has succeeded.

nested_items.name: targetTaskRunStatus
nested_items.description: The task status to start with on the job.

nested_items.name: taskRunStatusCounts
nested_items.description: The number of tasks running on the job.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: maxFailedTasksCount
nested_items.description: The number of task failures before the job stops running and is marked as FAILED.

nested_items.name: maxRetriesPerTask
nested_items.description: The maximum number of retries for a job.

nested_items.name: maxWorkerCount
nested_items.description: The maximum number of worker hosts that can concurrently process a job. When the maxWorkerCount is reached, no more workers will be assigned to process the job, even if the fleets assigned to the job's queue has available workers.

nested_items.name: sourceJobId
nested_items.description: The job ID for the source job.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If Deadline Cloud returns nextToken, then there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, call the operation again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. If no results remain, then nextToken is set to null. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. If you provide a token that isn't valid, then you receive an HTTP 400 ValidationException error.
